Reviews.Title: “Horrible place to stay- BED BUGS!!!”

Reviews.Content: family traveled october2011 stayed dump 2 nights stair smelled urinal night nail sticking floor front bathroom door called front desk told theyd check morning dont step floor stained badly top home bed bugs

Reviews.Title: “not bad!!”
Reviews.Author: dhar_sneha
Reviews.Content: willing spend lot money stay save shopping found hotel decent bathrooms severe clogging nice shift hospitality nice carrying extension laptop charger receptionist somehow helped breakfast bagels pretty hard overall dont provide choices kitchen amenities time day night includes oven cutlery etc beds bedding clean cosy

Reviews.Content: initially checked figured looking days inn sign counter refunds 10 minutes guess tipped entered initially check dresser cockroaches didnt filthy dont sheets washed hair mice droppings sink smoke alarm gone leaving wires exposed 6 month wife stay quickly loaded desk 102 refund la quinta highway 100
